law.catch_line: Restraining or enjoining of operations of employer.
law.text: The commissioner, upon showing a certification of noncompliance, may temporarily restrain or temporarily or permanently enjoin the further operation of any employer covered by this chapter. The action shall be brought in Franklin Circuit Court.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1830, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 15, sec. 88, effective April 4, 1994. -- Amended 1987 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 45, effective January 4, 1988. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 4.
